casebody.data:
William S. Vernam, et al., Appellants v. Edwin H. Baker, Respondent. Decided July 5, 1892. Appeal by plaintiffs from order staying the trial of the action. Robertsons & Harman, for appellants. Wing, Shoudy & Putnam, for respondent.

Before Freedman, P. J., Dugro and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with $10 costs, etc.
